name: monopoly_on_lambda
description: Back end for monopoly prize tracking for deployment to AWS Lambda
author: Dale Corns <codecantor@gmail.com>

scripts.local: node -e "require('./lambda.js').handler(require('./api-gateway-event.json'), {succeed: v => { console.log(v); process.exit(0); }}, (e, v) => { console.log(v); process.exit(1); })"
scripts.invoke-lambda: aws lambda invoke --function-name $npm_package_config_functionName --region $npm_package_config_region --payload file://api-gateway-event.json lambda-invoke-response.json && cat lambda-invoke-response.json
scripts.package-deploy: npm run package && npm run deploy
scripts.setup: npm install && (aws s3api get-bucket-location --bucket $npm_package_config_s3BucketName --region $npm_package_config_region || npm run create-bucket) && npm run package-deploy
scripts.win-invoke-lambda: aws lambda invoke --function-name %npm_package_config_functionName% --region %npm_package_config_region% --payload file://api-gateway-event.json lambda-invoke-response.json && cat lambda-invoke-response.json
scripts.win-package-deploy: npm run win-package && npm run win-deploy
scripts.win-setup: npm install && (aws s3api get-bucket-location --bucket %npm_package_config_s3BucketName% --region %npm_package_config_region% || npm run win-create-bucket) && npm run win-package-deploy
